favourite.article: We sang this in our blending meeting with the saints from Malaysia, Baguio and San Juan 2 nights ago in my hometownâ€”Baguio City, Philippines. It was a glorious expression. Within me I just say "Yes the Lord will fulfill His plan, because He has begun it and will finish it!" We are being built up because the sole building material is Christ and the sole builder is the Chrtist in us. Amen.
This hymn is really meant for the family of God. Understanding God and one's family.
We will have a sweet entrance into the kingdom of God by regeneration but more of that we need to inherit God's kingdom through maturity in life by seeing a corporate man the church.
The Lord desires for His Body to be built up. Lord, blend us. Lord build us.
1 Corinthians 12:24 but God has blended the body together... We need to be blended to other members of the Body of Christ.
This song is good. We have to gather together with the brothers and sisters. Grow together in ONE HEART guys...
